TunableVariant.name: save_outfit_category
TunableVariant.description: If set to 'save_this_category', a Sim saved while wearing this outfit category will change back into this outfit category on load. e.g.: you're tuning Everyday outfit, which is set as save_this_category, meaning a sim wearing everyday will still be wearing everyday on load. Otherwise, you can set to save_as_different_category, which allows you to specific another outfit category for the sim to be saved in instead of this category. e.g.: if tuning Bathing category, if the sim is in the bathing category, set this to Everyday so that when the sim loads back up, the sim will be in Everyday wear instead of naked.
